about_me: I’m a full-stack developer and cybersecurity enthusiast passionate about building secure and efficient digital systems. My journey blends development and security — creating applications that are not only powerful but resilient. From achieving a Top 10% rank on TryHackMe to solving CTF challenges in reverse engineering, OSINT, and network analysis, I love exploring how technology works beneath the surface.
what_im_doing: Contributing to open-source security tools and automations.
Developing scalable web applications using React and FastAPI.
Actively learning and improving in cloud security and DevSecOps.
Participating in Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions and security research.

education.institution: Shah and Anchor Kutchhi Engineering College, Mumbai University
D.G. Ruparel College of Arts, Science & Commerce, Mumbai
